item.title: A Shmoo's Guide to DC
item.description: Some of these recommendtions work best for Shmoocon in March vs Shmoocon in the cold of January. Orienting Yourself Below is a map of the neighborhoods. The gold star is the Hilton hotel. When you hear someone reference a neighborhood, hopefully this helps. The most common ones you’ll probably hear are Adams Morgan (Admo), Dupont Circle (Dupont), U St, The Mall, and Capitol Hill. Getting Around Metro Dupont station is going to be closest and that’ll get you to the red line.
